name: Line length
instruction:
Create a variable named `question` and assign it the value `How do you do?`.
Create a variable named `length` and assign it the value of the length of the string `question`.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const name = 'Jonh';
const lengthName = name.length;
```
